price: 21. Haddaan ku soo dejin laheyn Qur’aankan buur, waxaad arki lahayd buurtiyoo soo dhacaysa, la dillaacaysa cabsida iyo ka heybeysiga Ilaahay darti. Waxaana u soo qaadannaa mataalladan dadka bal inay fekeraan.
arabic: لَوۡ أَنزَلۡنَا هَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ عَلَىٰ جَبَلٖ لَّرَأَيۡتَهُۥ خَٰشِعٗا مُّتَصَدِّعٗا مِّنۡ خَشۡيَةِ ٱللَّهِۚ وَتِلۡكَ ٱلۡأَمۡثَٰلُ نَضۡرِبُهَا لِلنَّاسِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَفَكَّرُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: law anzalnā hādhā al-qur'āna ʿalā jabalin lara-aytahu khāshiʿan mutaṣaddiʿan min khashyati al-lahi watil'ka al-amthālu naḍribuhā lilnnāsi laʿallahum yatafakkarūna
